# Week 1 Quiz: Foundations of Physical AI

## Question 1

What is the primary difference between Physical AI and Digital AI systems?

A) Physical AI systems are more expensive
B) Physical AI systems must operate in real-time and interact with physical constraints
C) Digital AI systems can process more data
D) Physical AI systems require more memory

## Question 2

Which of the following is NOT a core principle of Physical AI?

A) Embodiment
B) Real-time Operation
C) Batch Processing
D) Continuous Interaction
